biotools.summary: Fully automated method for flexible docking with large scale motion in one of the docked molecules. The method automatically identifies hinge regions and rigid parts using HingeProt and then docks the input molecules while explicitly considering the hinges and possible protein motions.

bioschemas.name: FlexDock
